lead_paragraph: A group representing minority coaches is calling on the NCAA to adopt a rule that would require its member schools to interview a candidate of color for all head coaching and leadership vacancies.

headline.print_headline: Coaches' Group Calls on NCAA to Require Minority Interviews
headline.main: Coaches' Group Calls on NCAA to Require Minority Interviews

snippet: A group representing minority coaches is calling on the NCAA to adopt a rule that would require its member schools to interview a candidate of color for all head coaching and leadership vacancies....
